name: Micro Interaction: Disney+ Pause/Play Youtube Fast Forward
description:
Hi there,


This is a file about micro-interaction that happens for control switches on video streaming. The prototype covering play-pause and fast-forward interaction (inspired by Disney+ and Youtube).


I added minor improvements for icon consistency. Some of the icons Iâ€™ve used are from heroicons.com and I created them by myself base on the Disney+ interface.


I'm open to feedback and collaboration. Hit me up on twitter.com/muyas021


Thank you and enjoy,

Muyas
